name: nfae
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
-| wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
-| wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))

comment: All variables are effectively bound in an identical variable specifier. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
